data.text: @BBCPaulAdams The removal of mitigations in the #covid debacle is like the scientists in Jurassic Park celebrating their rebirth of the dinosaurs as the T-Rex eats them.
@BBCPaulAdams Stay safe in all ways Paul 🙋‍♀️
@NikkiJMarks Well, we're all kind of isolating this weekend...
@sue_robertson7 Well they won't be catching it from me, Sue. Have barely stepped outside in days. Also cut myself shaving this morning. What's going on?
@BBCPaulAdams Must admit that I’ve been wondering about 🇺🇦 🦠 Paul - wishing you a good recovery and so hoping that covid is not spreading throughout the population

@BBCPaulAdams I'm with you. Although clearly in luxury tin comparison. If you have the Flow test kits (most swabs only) it will be a while. Other NHS kits (nose and throat) show negative when nose only remain positive. Terribly frustrating  🤯
@BBCPaulAdams I'll be honest... Extenuating circumstance may apply here...
@BBCPaulAdams It always happens in the worst time. Get well soon.
